definition: pleasantly new or different, a printed and bound book that is an extended work of fiction
details:
adjective
- pleasantly new or different
= synonyms: refreshing
- original and of a kind not seen before
= example: original and of a kind not seen before
= synonyms: fresh
noun
- a printed and bound book that is an extended work of fiction
= example: a printed and bound book that is an extended work of fiction
- an extended fictional work in prose
